name: Cosmic Noodles Robber
description:
What if we made noodles out of planets? What's the taste of the big bang? TRY OUR GAME!

In order to search for high-quality noodles in the game, you will be competing with the universe to make noodles. You'll get some mysterious recipes that will not only tell you the ingredients, but also teach you how to knead your dough to make that special noodle! Attention: You need to type in the direction keys according to instructions given by both the recipes and the indicator bar to make a success ! Regardless of the final result is a success or failure, please be bold and full of confidence on it!

Guilde ：Spend 100 gold to  do adventure though the universes to collect plante as material ,  Make noodles following the guide of recipes to earn gold. Collect 3000 golds ！There are 9 kinds of special recipes in this game， try to collect all of them!

It supports two languages which are English and Chinese
